thread.section_title: Grand Hotel du Palais Royal - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect location
thread.title_full: Perfect location - Review of Grand Hotel du Palais Royal, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ivladi2015
title: Perfect location
text: Excellent 5* service - the staff went an extra mile to take care of us. A very good quiet location - we asked for a quiet room and got one facing courtyard. Not much of a view, but indeed very quiet. The bed was very comfortable, the room on the small side, the bathroom modern and spotless. The food in the bar was delicious. Overall very pleased with the choice.
